metric.name: Clears
metric.description: The total number of times a clear has been done on this cache.

metric.name: Gets
metric.description: The total number of times a successful get has been done on this cache.

metric.name: Get Time
metric.description: Total time spent doing get operations from this cache (includ足ing netsearch and netload).

metric.name: Average Get Time
metric.description: Average get time.

metric.name: Creates
metric.description: The total number of times an entry is added to this cache.

metric.name: Destroys
metric.description: The total number of times a cache object entry has been destroyed in this cache.

metric.name: Updates
metric.description: The total number of updates originating remotely that have been applied to this cache.

metric.name: Update Time
metric.description: Total time spent performing an update.

metric.name: Average Update Time
metric.description: Average update time.

metric.name: Puts
metric.description: The total number of times an entry is added or replaced in this cache as a result of a local operation (put(), create(), or get() which results in load, netsearch, or netloading a value). Note, this only counts puts done explicitly on this cache. It does not count updates pushed from other caches.

metric.name: Put Time
metric.description: Total time spent adding or replacing an entry in this cache as a result of a local operation. This includes synchronizing on the map, invoking cache callbacks, sending messages to other caches, and waiting for responses (if required).

metric.name: Average Put Time
metric.description: Average put time.

metric.name: Putalls
metric.description: The total number of times a map is added or replaced in this cache as a result of a local operation. Note, this only counts putAlls done explicitly on this cache; it does not count updates pushed from other caches.

metric.name: Putall Time
metric.description: Total time spent replacing a map in this cache as a result of a local operation. This includes synchronizing on the map, invoking cache callbacks, sending messages to other caches and waiting for responses (if required).

metric.name: Average Put All Time
metric.description: Average put all time.

metric.name: Misses
metric.description: Total number of times a get on the cache did not find a value already in local memory. The number of hits (that is, gets that did not miss) can be calculated by subtracting misses from gets.

metric.name: Entries
metric.description: The total number of entries in this cache.

metric.name: Loads In Progress
metric.description: Current number of threads in this cache doing a cache load.

metric.name: Loads Completed
metric.description: Total number of times a load on this cache has completed as a result of either a local get() or a remote netload.

metric.name: Load Time
metric.description: Total time spent invoking loaders on this cache.

metric.name: Netloads In Progress
metric.description: Current number of threads doing a network load initiated by a get() in this cache.

metric.name: Netloads Completed
metric.description: Total number of times a network load initiated on this cache has completed.

metric.name: Netload Time
metric.description: Total time spent doing network loads on this cache.

metric.name: Netsearches In Progress
metric.description: Current number of threads doing a network search initiated by a get() in this cache.

metric.name: Netsearches Completed
metric.description: Total number of times network searches initiated by this cache have completed.

metric.name: Netsearch Time
metric.description: Total time spent doing network searches for cache values.

metric.name: Cache Writer Calls In Progress
metric.description: Current number of threads doing a cache writer call.

metric.name: Cache Writer Calls Completed
metric.description: Total number of times a cache writer call has completed.

metric.name: Cache Writer Call Time
metric.description: Total time spent doing cache writer calls.

metric.name: Cache Listener Calls In Progress
metric.description: Current number of threads doing a cache listener call.

metric.name: Cache Listener Calls Completed
metric.description: Total number of times a cache listener call has completed.

metric.name: Cache Listener Call Time
metric.description: Total time spent doing cache listener calls.

metric.name: Get Initial Images In Progress
metric.description: Current number of getInitialImage operations currently in progress.

metric.name: Get Initial Images Completed
metric.description: Total number of times getInitialImages initiated by this cache have completed.

metric.name: Get Initial Image Time
metric.description: Total time spent doing getInitialImages for region creation.

metric.name: Get Initial Image Keys Received
metric.description: Total number of keys received while doing getInitialImage operations.

metric.name: Regions
metric.description: The current number of regions in the cache.

metric.name: Partitioned Regions
metric.description: The current number of partitioned regions in the cache.

metric.name: Invalidates
metric.description: The total number of times an existing cache object entry value in this cache has been invalidated.

metric.name: Event Queue Size
metric.description: The number of cache events waiting to be processed.

metric.name: Event Queue Throttle Time
metric.description: The total amount of time, in nanoseconds, spent delayed by the event queue throttle.

metric.name: Event Queue Throttle Count
metric.description: The total number of times a thread was delayed in adding an event to the event queue.

metric.name: Event Threads
metric.description: The number of threads currently processing events.

metric.name: Query Executions
metric.description: Total number of times some query has been executed.

metric.name: Query Execution Time
metric.description: Total time spent executing queries.

metric.name: Average Query Execution Time
metric.description: Average query execution time.

metric.name: Reliable Queued Ops
metric.description: Current number of cache operations queued for distribution to required roles.

metric.name: Reliable Queue Size
metric.description: Current size in megabytes of disk used to queue for distribu足tion to required roles.

metric.name: Reliable Queue Max
metric.description: Maximum size in megabytes allotted for disk usage to queue for distribution to required roles.

metric.name: Reliable Regions
metric.description: Current number of regions configured for reliability.

metric.name: Reliable Regions Missing
metric.description: Current number regions configured for reliability that are missing required roles.

metric.name: Reliable Regions Queuing
metric.description: Current number regions configured for reliability that are queuing for required roles.

metric.name: Reliable Regions Missing Full Access
metric.description: Current number of regions configured for reliability that are missing require roles with full access.

metric.name: Reliable Regions Missing Limited Access
metric.description: Current number of regions configured for reliability that are missing required roles with limited access.

metric.name: Reliable Regions Missing No Access
metric.description: Current number of regions configured for reliability that are missing required roles with no access.

metric.name: Tx Commits
metric.description: Total number of times a transaction commit has succeeded.

metric.name: Tx Failures
metric.description: Total number of times a transaction commit has failed.

metric.name: Tx Rollbacks
metric.description: Total number of times a transaction has been explicitly rolled back.

metric.name: Tx Success Life Time
metric.description: The total amount of time, in nanoseconds, spent in a transaction before a successful commit. The time measured starts at transaction begin and ends when commit is called.

metric.name: Tx Failed Life Time
metric.description: The total amount of time, in nanoseconds, spent in a transaction before a failed commit. The time measured starts at transaction begin and ends when commit is called.

metric.name: Tx Rollback Life Time
metric.description: The total amount of time, in nanoseconds, spent in a transaction before an explicit rollback. The time measured starts at transaction begin and ends when rollback is called.

metric.name: Tx Commit Time
metric.description: The total amount of time, in nanoseconds, spent doing successful trans足action commits.

metric.name: Tx Failure Time
metric.description: The total amount of time, in nanoseconds, spent doing failed transaction commits.

metric.name: Tx Rollback Time
metric.description: The total amount of time, in nanoseconds, spent doing explicit transac足tion rollbacks.

metric.name: Tx Commit Changes
metric.description: Total number of changes made by committed transactions.

metric.name: Tx Failure Changes
metric.description: Total number of changes lost by failed transactions.

metric.name: Tx Rollback Changes
metric.description: Total number of changes lost by explicit transaction rollbacks.

metric.name: Tx Conflict Check Time
metric.description: The total amount of time, in nanoseconds, spent doing conflict checks during transaction commit.
